Plot: The warrior Beowulf must fight and defeat the monster Grendel who is terrorizing Denmark, and later, Grendel's mother, who begins killing out of revenge.
Title: Beowulf
Writer: Neil Gaiman (screenplay), Roger Avary (screenplay), Anonymous (epic poem "Beowulf")
Actors: Robin Wright, Anthony Hopkins, Paul Baker, John Bilezikjian
tomatoConsensus: Featuring groundbreaking animation, stunning visuals, and a talented cast, Beowulf has in spades what more faithful book adaptations forget to bring: pure cinematic entertainment.
